CICLO DE BUSCA

t1: MAR <- (PC)           t1: 0110000000000000000001000000 0000 00 00 0000
     ULA <- (PC) 
t2: memória <- (MAR)  t2: 0000000000000000000000010010 0000 10 00 0000 
t3: MBR <- (memória)  t3: 1000000000000000000000100101 0000 01 00 0000 
     PC <- (ULA) 
t4: IR <- (MBR)             t4: 0000100000000100000000000000 0000 00 00 0000

CICLOS DE EXECUÇÃO

ADD S1, S2, S3 (REGISTRADOR COM REGISTRADOR)
t1: ULA <- (S3)              t1: 0000000000100000000010000000 0000 00 00 0000
t2: ULA <- (S2)              t2: 0000000010000000000010000000 0000 00 00 0000
t3: ULA <- (S1)              t3: 0000001000000000000010000000 0101 00 00 0000
t4: S1 <- (ULA)              t4: 0000010000000000000001000000 0000 00 00 0000

ADD S1, S2, X (REGISTRADOR COM CONSTANTE)
t1: MBR <- (memória)   t1: 1000000000000000000000100101 0000 01 00 0000
t2: ULA <- (MBR)          t2: 0000100000000000000010000000 0000 00 00 0000
t3: ULA <- (S2)              t3: 0000000010000000000010000000 0000 00 00 0000
t4: ULA <- (S1)              t4: 0000001000000000000010000000 0101 00 00 0000
t5: S1 <- (ULA)              t5: 0000010000000000000001000000 0000 00 00 0000

SUB S1, S2, S3 (REGISTRADOR COM REGISTRADOR)
t1: ULA <- (S3)              t1: 0000000000100000000010000000 0000 00 00 0000
t2: ULA <- (S2)              t2: 0000000010000000000010000000 0000 00 00 0000
t3: ULA <- (S1)              t3: 0000001000000000000010000000 0110 00 00 0000
t4: S1 <- (ULA)              t4: 0000010000000000000001000000 0000 00 00 0000

SUB S1, S2, X (REGISTRADOR COM CONSTANTE)
t1: MBR <- (memória)   t1: 1000000000000000000000100101 0000 01 00 0000
t2: ULA <- (MBR)          t2: 0000100000000000000010000000 0000 00 00 0000
t3: ULA <- (S2)              t3: 0000000010000000000010000000 0000 00 00 0000
t4: ULA <- (S1)              t4: 0000001000000000000010000000 0110 00 00 0000
t5: S1 <- (ULA)              t5: 0000010000000000000001000000 0000 00 00 0000
